name: SOULS KEEPER (PixiboxStudio)
description:
This is a sulvival and adventure game in which you will have to safe the jungle by sacrificing a certain number of enemies in the surounded area of the Mother of Trees, which is the biggest tree in the jungle. Carefull with the enemies, they act like zombies and they can get very numerous! Good Luck!

CONTROLS:

-Movement: WASD

-Jump: Space Bar

-Basic Attack: Left Mouse Button

-Area Attack: E

-Distaction ability: R
